Test Summary: Successful UPI Payment Initiation and Completion
Test Data: payer_vpa: payer@ybl, payee_vpa: payee@apl, amount: 10.0, payer_pin: 123456, transaction_id: TXN1234567890, transaction_note: Test payment, device_id: ABCDEFG12345
Expected Result: status: SUCCESS, transaction_id: TXN1234567890, response_code: 00, response_message: Transaction successful, utrn: UTR123456789012345

Test Summary: UPI Payment Rejection due to Insufficient Funds
Test Data: payer_vpa: payer@ybl, payee_vpa: payee@apl, amount: 1000.0, payer_pin: 123456, transaction_id: TXN0987654321, transaction_note: Test payment - insufficient funds, device_id: HIJKLMN67890
Expected Result: status: FAILURE, transaction_id: TXN0987654321, response_code: 05, response_message: Insufficient Funds, utrn: None

Test Data: payer_vpa: invalid_vpa, payee_vpa: payee@apl, amount: 5.0, payer_pin: 123456, transaction_id: TXN5432109876, transaction_note: Test payment - invalid payer VPA, device_id: OPQRSTU01234
Expected Result: status: FAILURE, transaction_id: TXN5432109876, response_code: 12, response_message: Invalid Payer VPA format, utrn: None

Test Data: payer_vpa: payer@ybl, payee_vpa: payee@apl, amount: 20.0, payer_pin: wrongpin, transaction_id: TXN6789012345, transaction_note: Test payment - incorrect PIN, device_id: VWXYZAB56789
Expected Result: status: FAILURE, transaction_id: TXN6789012345, response_code: 91, response_message: Invalid PIN, utrn: None

Test Data: payer_vpa: payer@ybl, payee_vpa: payee@apl, amount: 15.0, payer_pin: 123456, transaction_id: TXN2345678901, transaction_note: Test payment - timeout simulation, device_id: CDEFGHIJ90123
Expected Result: status: PENDING, transaction_id: TXN2345678901, response_code: 25, response_message: Transaction timed out. Please check transaction status., utrn: None
